mapper.select: SELECT /* com.at.apcss.pd.aom.mapper.InvShipOgnReqMngMapper.hiddenGrdIsoSelectList */ DECODE((SELECT APRV FROM TB_EV_APO WHERE BRNO = D.UO_BRNO) , '1' , '승인형' , '2' , '육성형' , '' ) AS APRV ,D.UO_BRNO ,(SELECT CORP_NM FROM TB_EV_APO WHERE BRNO = D.UO_BRNO )AS UO_CORP_NM ,DECODE(A.ROAD_NM_DTL_ADDR , '' , '[지번]' || A.LOTNO_ADDR || ' ' || A.LOTNO_DTL_ADDR , '[도로명]'|| A.ROAD_NM_ADDR || ' ' || A.ROAD_NM_DTL_ADDR ) AS ADDR ,A.BRNO ,A.CORP_NM ,DECODE( (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_EV_APO_UO_CD WHERE ISO_BRNO = A.BRNO) , 1, 'N' , 'Y') AS UO_BRNO_CNT ,(SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'CORP_SE_CD' AND CD_VL = A.CORP_SE_CD) AS CORP_SE_CD ,(SELECT CD_VL_NM FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL WHERE CD_ID = 'CORP_SHAP' AND CD_VL = A.CORP_DTL_SE_CD) AS CORP_DTL_SE_CD ,A.CORP_FNDN_DAY ,NVL(A.INVST_NOPE,0) AS INVST_NOPE ,NVL(A.INVST_EXPND_FRMER_NOPE,0) AS INVST_EXPND_FRMER_NOPE ,NVL(A.INVST_AMT,0) AS INVST_AMT ,NVL(A.FRMER_INVST_AMT,0) AS FRMER_INVST_AMT ,NVL(A.PRDCR_GRP_INVST_AMT,0) AS PRDCR_GRP_INVST_AMT ,NVL(A.LOCGOV_INVST_AMT,0) AS LOCGOV_INVST_AMT ,NVL(A.ETC_INVST_AMT,0) AS ETC_INVST_AMT ,A.FRMER_INVST_AMT_RT ,DECODE(D.UO_BRNO , B.UO_BRNO , NVL(B.ISO_FUND_APLY_AMT,0) , 0) AS ISO_FUND_APLY_AMT ,A.PIC_FLNM ,A.PIC_TELNO ,A.PIC_MOBLNO ,A.PIC_EML ,B.CORP_DDLN_SE_CD FROM USRAM.TB_EV_APO A ,(SELECT * FROM USRAM.TB_EV_APLY_MNG WHERE 1=1 AND BRNO NOT IN (SELECT BRNO FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID IN ('at21','at22','at23','at24','at25','at26','at27','at61')) )B ,(SELECT * FROM USRAM.TB_EV_APO_UO_CD WHERE 1=1 AND ISO_BRNO NOT IN (SELECT BRNO FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID IN ('at21','at22','at23','at24','at25','at26','at27','at61')) AND UO_BRNO NOT IN (SELECT BRNO FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID IN ('at11','at12','at13','at14','at15','at16','at17','at51')) ) D WHERE B.YR = #{yr} AND B.APO_CD = A.APO_CD(+) AND B.APO_SE = '2' AND B.APO_CD = D.ISO_APO_CD(+) ORDER BY B.BRNO , D.UO_BRNO
